channel.title: [PI] Correctly working soulsplit
channel.description:
based on erasedpkz, my soulsplit heals 2 every hit you deliver, instead of healing 1/2 of my own hit
could anyone tell me how i can get this to work correctly?

item.title: [PI] Correctly working soulsplit
item.dc:creator: @excel4 excel4
item.description:
@excel4 wrote:

No, it would half all of the damage given. Well, at least i’m pretty sure of it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Correctly working soulsplit
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

[quote=“excel4, post:2, topic:401076”]You enter the class that deals with skills, find prayer, and change the digit from 2 to 0.5. I hope this helps, sorry I don’t have much info with which class it’s in and where it is. I’ve seen this happen before.

- Excel4[/quote]

wouldnt that make it add 0.5 hp every hit?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Correctly working soulsplit
item.dc:creator: @excel4 excel4
item.description:
@excel4 wrote:

You enter the class that deals with skills, find prayer, and change the digit from 2 to 0.5. I hope this helps, sorry I don’t have much info with which class it’s in and where it is. I’ve seen this happen before.

- Excel4

Read full topic
